long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unicom Solutions API integration platform providing database driven screen pops. The Unicom Solutions app integrates with back-office applications using APIs (Salesforce.com, Zendesk etc.) By leveraging APIs the Unicom Solutions extension will search any internal database and present the findings in a new window, The Unicom Solutions app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
